# pm25_2013

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(sf)
library(viridis)
```

```{r}
pm25_2013 <- "../data/output/local/extractions_2013" %>% 
  list.files(full.names = TRUE) %>% 
  lapply(function(x) st_as_sf(read_rds(x))) %>% 
  bind_rows()

write_rds(pm25_2013, "../data/output/pm25_2013.rds")
```

```{r}
pm25_2013 %>% 
  st_simplify() %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = zip_concentrations), colour = NA, lwd = 0) + 
  scale_fill_viridis()
```
